subtitle: These vegetarian burgers are very easy to make if you have a food processor - otherwise they need to be mashed well.

method.text: Pour the oil into a heavy based frying pan. Fry the garlic and onion until just tender but not browned. Leave to cool a little.

Spoon the onion mixture into a food processor. Add remaining ingredients. Process until required consistency is achieved - about 1 min for a chunky burger or 2 min for a smooth burger. Chill for 20 min.
With lightly floured hands, shape the cooled mixture into burgers.
Shallow fry the burgers in a little oil over a gentle heat for 4-5 min on each side.
